operation.name: findById
operation.sql: SELECT param_name ,param_value ,extend_attribute_one ,extend_attribute_two ,raw_add_time ,raw_update_time,description FROM sys_param WHERE param_name=?

operation.name: findByLike
operation.sql: SELECT param_name ,param_value ,extend_attribute_one ,extend_attribute_two ,raw_add_time ,raw_update_time,description FROM sys_param where param_name like ? order by param_name

operation.name: paramInfoQueryCount
operation.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) from sys_param where param_name = ?
operation.sqlmap: SELECT COUNT(*) from sys_param where 1 =1 <dynamic> <isNotEmpty property="paramName" prepend=" and "> param_name like concat('%',#paramName#,'%') </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="description" prepend=" and "> description like concat('%',#description#,'%') </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="extendAttributeOne" prepend=" and "> extend_attribute_one = #extendAttributeOne# </isNotEmpty> </dynamic>

operation.name: paramInfoQueryList
operation.sql: SELECT param_name, param_value, extend_attribute_one, extend_attribute_two, raw_add_time, raw_update_time,description from sys_param where param_name =?
operation.sqlmap: SELECT param_name, param_value, extend_attribute_one, extend_attribute_two, raw_add_time, raw_update_time,description from sys_param where 1 =1 <dynamic> <isNotEmpty property="sysParam.paramName" prepend=" and "> param_name like concat('%',#sysParam.paramName#,'%') </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="sysParam.description" prepend=" and "> description like concat('%',#sysParam.description#,'%') </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="sysParam.extendAttributeOne" prepend=" and "> extend_attribute_one = #sysParam.extendAttributeOne# </isNotEmpty> </dynamic> <isEmpty property="sortCol" prepend=" order by "> raw_update_time DESC </isEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="sortCol" prepend=" order by "> $sortCol$ <isNotEmpty property="sortOrder"> $sortOrder$ </isNotEmpty> </isNotEmpty> LIMIT #limitStart#,#pageSize#;
